acceptedAnswer.text: The TON Blockchain provides scalable and efficient infrastructure for Fragment Telegram. It was originally designed by the team behind Telegram Messenger and is known for handling millions of transactions per second with advanced consensus algorithms and sharding.

acceptedAnswer.text: Key features include enhanced privacy and security through encryption, decentralization via a peer-to-peer model, scalability with dynamic sharding, and financial integration allowing cryptocurrency transactions and smart contracts.
